name: Clash of Panzer
description:
The ultimate tank battle game, Clash of Panzer, is now available for download! Join millions of players and experience the thrill of this fast-paced, action-packed online PvP battle. Choose from more than 400 legendary vehicles, not only tanks, but also legendary armored vehicles and powerful helicopters, and participate in intense 12v12 real-time battles. Get ready for epic clashes with players from all over the world and show off your strategic skills. Download Armored Clash now and conquer the battlefield like never before!



[authentic Vehicles]
Kingtiger,Panther,T-72,T-90,Leopard II,Chieftain,AH-64,M2 Bradley,AH-1,UH-60 Black Hawk, multiple historical famous vehicles await your command!

[combat Modes]
Single Combat, Team Battle and Campaign Mode, every mode has its own unique gameplay and objective. Nevertheless, destroying all enemies will always be the surest way to win!

[various Tactics]
Every vehicle has multiple parts which could be upgraded. Increasing the firepower of your tank, increasing the maneuverability of your armoured vehicle, and performance of your helicopter, get into a fast pace multi-arms combat!

[international Teams]
Fight with your friend against players from every corner of the world, Hold your position, and then attack. We don`t have DEFEAT in our dictionary!

Download Clash of Panzer, experience the joy of warfare!
